actions.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Mullin to the Rules amendment (A001).

House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to allow bridge work to be done despite the presence of swallows if the bridge has a condition rating of 3 or less until a rulemaking has occurred; require notification to the Secretary of Interior, and also direct the Secretary to promulgate a rulemaking to allow for bridge work under the Migratory Bird Treaty Act (MBTA).
